Text: If I try and save an image file through the windows version not dos it is incredibley slow. 20mb/MIN max. If I try to retrieve a saved image it says file is not a valid image file. I have another version of active@ disk image that is an app only, not a boot disk and that will save/ retrieve the saved files Aok. I dunno I think this is a dud for active disk image, the other programs may work? Any help here?

Do not download, why not work! "The file is not a valid image."
Tested by me at: 14/07/10 2:27 pm
how to burn it on cd?

To jayveenickoh,

1. Start Nero Express
2. Select The "Image, Project, Copy" Tab
3. Now Select "Disc Image Or Saved Project"
4. Select The Image You Want To Burn
5. Change The "Recorder" From "Image Recorder" To Your "Writer"
6. Change The Speed (Click On The Left Sign & Select 16X For CD Or 8X For DVD)
7. Click The Burn Button.......
